attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conform
the base architecture for crowdsales. They are *not* intended to be modified / overriden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropiate to concatenate
behavior.
attributes.name: Crowdsale
TokenPurchase
_preValidatePurchase
_postValidatePurchase
_deliverTokens
_processPurchase
_updatePurchasingState
_getTokenAmount

attributes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.
